alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 5:16PM MST until August 23 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 600 PM MST. * At 516 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Congress to 7 miles south of Yarnell to 8 miles west of Castle Hot Springs, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Surprise, Buckeye, Wickenburg, Wittmann, Circle City, White Tank Mountain Park and Morristown. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 86 and 135. AZ Route 74 between mile markers 1 and 17. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
